description: Try our easy to follow Ciabatta Toasties With Mediterranean Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ciabatta Toasties With Mediterranean Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 tbs olive oil, save 1 tbs for drizzling

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, heavybased frying pan and cook the eggplant slices in batches over a high heat for 1-2 minutes on each side until browned and tender. Remove with a fish slice and keep warm.
Meanwhile, cut the ciabatta loaf in half lengthways, then each half in half again widthways. Place on the grill rack and cook under a preheated high grill, cutside up, for 1 minute until golden.

Spread each ciabatta toastie with 1 tablespoon of the pesto. Top with the warm eggplant slices, then the tomato slices and finally the mozzarella slices. Drizzle each toastie with 1 tablespoon olive oil, then return to the grill and cook for a further 2 minutes until the mozzarella is melting and beginning to brown in places.
Season with pepper and serve warm.
